career_goals.main_goal: Land a job that enables continuous learning, exploration, and growth in technology
secondary_goals: Become a technical expert whose experience and knowledge make him irreplaceable by AI
Build a balanced professional and social life
career_goals.belief: Coding is about thinking â€” if you can think correctly, you can learn any tech out there
career_goals.inspiration: Passion for technology, curiosity, and problem-solving

education.description: Focused on physics and mathematics, building a strong foundation in scientific reasoning and analytical thinking. Actively engaged in experiments, lab work, and problem-solving activities to strengthen conceptual understanding.

education.degree: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
education.description: Gained in-depth knowledge of AI, machine learning, deep learning. Developed practical skills through hands-on projects and internships, specializing in full-stack development and data-driven solutions.

experience.description: Worked on building an LLM like GPT from scratch. Learned DDP, UDA, and advanced architectures. Gained experience in reading and implementing complex AI documentation and architectures.

journey_timeline: Started tech career with zero prior knowledge
Learned Python as first programming language within 1 month
Explored data science and classic ML algorithms
Dived into DSA and version control (Git)
Learned Java for deeper DSA practice
Transitioned to full-stack development (HTML, CSS, JS)
Built a complete web project independently within 1 month
Learned deployment using Render and Docker
Practiced DSA regularly and became proficient
Explored AI and deep learning while continuing web development
Developed end-to-end applications combining AI and web
Worked as AI researcher focusing on modern LLMs and AI tools
Explored and experimented with all modern AI tools available in the market

skills: Mentored junior students in technical growth
Collects multiple points of view and aligns team understanding
Assigns tasks based on strengths and weaknesses
Encourages peers to step out of comfort zones

projects.title: AI-Powered YouTube Filtering Extension
projects.description: A Chrome extension that filters and recommends YouTube videos based on user-defined prompts and session times.
projects.detailed_description: Leverages NLP and ML to analyze video metadata (titles, descriptions, captions, comments). Users can define prompts and session-based filters while keeping recommendations neutral. Real-time API handling and dynamic DOM injection ensure seamless UX.

projects.title: Website Emotion and Vulnerability Analyzer
projects.description: An NLP-powered tool analyzing websites for emotional tone, semantic context, and security risks.

projects.title: Corpus-Based Enterprise Chatbot Generator
projects.description: Low-code platform to generate domain-specific chatbots for small businesses using AI and NLP.

projects.title: Review Classification and AI Summarizer for E-Commerce
projects.description: Processes user reviews for sentiment, spam detection, and summary using Gemini Pro API.

projects.title: Home Fitness Tracker and Recommendation Web App
projects.description: Personalized web app to track workouts, monitor progress, and get fitness recommendations.

projects.title: Entrepreneurial Recommendation Platform
projects.description: ML-powered platform to match entrepreneurs based on profiles, skills, and goals.

projects.title: Recruitment Analytics Platform
projects.description: Data-driven recruitment system automating candidate evaluation using AI and vector search.
